data.title: bio, discography and more about Neil Young
data.text:
Neil Young â unofficial website

Ranked among the biggest songwriters like Bob Dylan, Bruce Springsteen and Gram Parsons, Neil Young is one of the greatest in popular music. He recorded his first single in 1969 and still creating music.

Neil Young is one of the few artists who successfully, and in his own unique way, has mix sensitive and delicate songs with electrified and distorted rawness. His mission for finding new expressions have sometimes resulted in turning the sounds in new directions that have made him hard to reach for some. After tons of albums, it is undoubtedly that his legacy have become huge.

In 2012 Neil Young wrote his biography Waging Heavy Piece in which he tells us about his life as a man and an artist. He also mentions his ongoing project with Pono â a new music format that will let us hear music as the musicians heard it in the studio â and Lincvolt â an automobile driven by alternative energy, but still looks like a classic car.

Neil Young has always been noted for high integrity, he refused all ideas to make use of his music in commercial situations. Although he does not get involved in politics as a person, he did take a clear stand against the George W. Bush administration with the album Living With War and the following tour.

Short facts

Neil Young was born on November 12, 1946 in Toronto. So far, he has done 35 studio albums and 59 singles. He has two sons (Zeke and Ben) and one daughter (Amber Jean). He was previously married to Pegi Young. In 1995, he was included in the Rock and Roll Hall of Fame.

Other content

See a collection of pictures.

See opinions of Neil Young in different areas.

Lyric quotes

"It's better to burn out than to fade away" - Hey Hey, My My

"I am just a dreamer, but you are just a dream" - Like a Hurricane

"The way she dances makes my world stand still / And she's spinning in the sky / Every move is like a psychedelic pill / From a doctor I can't buy - Psychedelic Pill

About NeilYoung.eu

NeilYong.eu is an unofficial website that telling a story about one of the greatest musicians and artist of our time. You can use the site if you are searching for information about Neil Youngâs biography or want to know more about the albums (some albums are not yet presented on the site, but will be so in the future). There are other sections with various facts and some trivia about Neil Young.
